CAREER:
The first 2 years were spent in agency at Spring Personnel where Will won 'Top Recruiter' and survived the great recession of 2008.
The last 6 years he's spent in-house at companies like SGS and INC Research working on recruitment campaigns across all 6 continents.
Through trial and error (heavily weighted on errors!) he discovered a new way of sourcing candidates online, mostly in social networks and using technology.
For the past few years he's been sharing this knowledge and training colleagues.
I can tell you more about... %[Social sourcing](postback:social_sourcing) %[Training](postback:training) %[Right now](postback:right_now?)
SOCIAL SOURCING:
I'm glad you asked. This is part of what makes Will so unique compared to most.
Always curious, Will's ah ha momemnt came when he discovered a small internet sourcing community that had existed for years.
Whilst his colleagues were caught-up in the recruitment rat race looking in the same old places everyone else was he began to develop skills in finding the coverted 'passive candidate'. This made him smile üòä %[Now, on to training](postback:training)
TRAINING:
He's helped his colleagues develop their personal brand, find ways of attracting talent in crowded spaces, and sourcing candidates across, LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Google+...
He even started a recruitment blog where he shares tips, tricks, and views on social sourcing and technology. %[Show me something cool](postback:show_me) %[The blog](postback:the_blog) %[More on the career](postback:campaigns)

IDEAL JOB:
What really excites Will is helping businesses be more creative with their recruitment through technology.
Specifically he's looking at Tech Talent roles because he excels at being the point-person and internal expert on internet sourcing and technology. %[Areas of interest](postback:areas_of_interest)
AREAS OF INTEREST:
As you can probably tell, right now he's into the messaging and chatbot space.
Will has some great ideas on how bots could work with recruiters and candidates alike.
If you have something you want to share with Will or you just want to pick his brains about bots... %[Connect with Will](postback:connect)
EARLY YEARS:
At school academics wasn't Will's strong point but he always had a strong internal drive. After finishing school, Will spent his summer living and working in Australia at a Marketing Agency as a Junior Designer.
Before recruitment he worked for Barclays as Personal Banker and even in Estate Agency (or if you're American, Real Estate). %[What did he learn](postback:what_did_he_learn)
WHAT DID HE LEARN: Well, apart from learning how to ski in Australia of all places and deciding Estate Agency and Banking wasn't for him! He actually developed a keen interest in design and marketing, which still influences much of his work and interests today. %[Why recruitment](postback:why_recruitment)
DEVELOPMENT:
Naturally curious, Will's always learning new things.
He studied the black arts of internet sourcing and became a 'Certified Sourcing Ninja'.
He's even taught himself how to build web sites. %[Learning](postback:learning) %[Sourcing Ninja](postback:sourcing_ninja) %[Web development](postback:web_development)
LEARNING:
Currently, Will's learning analytical and tactical skills to help grow and develop his digital marketing knowledge.
He's also learning a bit of Python on the side.
SOURCING NINJA:

HERE FOR THE BOT: I knew it! How can I help? %[What are chatbots?](postback:what_are_chatbots?) %[Build me a bot](postback:build_me_a_bot)
WHAT ARE CHATBOTS?: Bots can simulate conversation, even automate tasks that you would normally do yourself, like making a dinner reservation. %[Why chatbots?](postback:why_chatbots?)
WHY CHATBOTS?: Great question! It‚Äôs because for the first time ever people are using messenger apps more than they are using social networks./nFor example, some bots are used to handle a variety of service requests, which normally require a telephone call or customer agent. %[Taco Bell bot](postback:taco_bell_bot) %[X.ai bot](postback:xai_bot)
TACO BELL BOT: Taco Bell recently released a bot that allows you to order and pay for tacos through an automated chat conversation.
XAI BOT: Other bots like X.ai can help schedule your meetings by simply adding the bot to your email thread.

HELP ME:

You can also say 'connect' to talk to Will or say 'bye' when you're done talking with me.
